Title: Relates to electronically secure proposal submissions to the New York state thruway authority
Summary: Provides for electronically secure proposal submissions to the New York state thruway authority and electronic posting for public view.
LawCode: Amd ยง359, Pub Auth L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the public authorities law, in relation to the electronic submission and public posting of bids for New York state thruway authority construction, reconstruction and improvement contracts
